name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken and slice it. Chop the lettuce, tomato, and onion. Mix all ingredients in a bowl, squeeze lemon juice on top, and sprinkle cheese before serving.

name: Cheesy Meat and Potato Bake
instructions: Cook the meat with chopped onions. Slice and bake potatoes until soft. Layer the cooked meat, potatoes, and cheese in a baking dish, then bake until the cheese is melted.

name: Chicken and Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook the rice. Sauté the chicken with onions until golden brown. Serve the chicken over rice and drizzle with fresh lemon juice.

name: Meat Lettuce Wraps
instructions: Cook the meat with chopped onions. Add ketchup for flavor. Serve the cooked meat wrapped in fresh lettuce leaves.

name: Tomato Rice with Chicken
instructions: Cook rice with chopped tomatoes and onions. Grill or sauté chicken and serve it over the tomato rice with a squeeze of lemon juice.

name: Ultimate Mixed Dish
instructions: Boil the potatoes and rice separately. Sauté the meat and chicken with onions. Chop the tomato and lettuce. Mix everything in a large pan, adding ketchup and cheese. Stir well and serve with a squeeze of lemon.
